name: Battle Simulator
description:
Please consider buying only if you wish to support the development of Battle Simulator.
You should wait before buying if you want to play a game with more content.

Soldier to the assault! Deploy your troops and destroy the enemy army! Choose the right units and strategically place them to defeat your enemy!

You will have the choice between 3 units: Barbarian, Lancer, Archer! Cross 2 different biomes in 30 unique levels!

May the best army win!

"War is like hunting, except that rabbits shoot at war"

Features:

► Nice poly decorations!
► 3 different troops available!
► 2 different biomes!
► 30 levels!
► Play against AI!
► Good gameplay!
► Easy to take in hand!
► Nice medieval music!
